funders.desc: We would not be here today if it were not for our incredible group of volunteers and contributors who contributed to the success of LerGO as well as our funding efforts on Indiegogo and beyond. Thank you for helping us make it happen!
funders.title: Key Funders List

tooltip.go: Click here to play the lesson.

lergo.description: LerGO is a new non-profit EdTech venture aimed at providing free, animated & interactive online lessons for all children, anywhere, at any time. This will be made possible through LerGO's open source cloud platform, which will leverage the goodwill of the community, enabling contributors to easily create animated & interactive lessons. Kids will use these lessons as a free alternative to private tutoring/lessons, to self-learn all school subjects, enjoyably and at their own pace.
lergo.title: LerGO - Educate Yourself

overview.desc: LerGO is a non-profit open source EdTech venture dedicated to self education and reducing the social gap. Our goal is to provide every child with free access to high quality and interactive online lessons. This can be made possible via LerGO's cloud platform that will harness the goodwill of the community, enabling it to easily create educational content. Kids can use these lessons to self learn all school subjects, enjoyably and at their own pace. LerGO is now in beta and we are in the process of loading initial content.
overview.title: Overview

profile.changeImageText: You can change your profile avatar via "http://en.gravatar.com/". Please note that kids below 13 years old cannot load their own images and those below 18 only with their parents consent
